synopsis.text: With an unquenchable thirst for knowledge, Tang San, a master of hidden weapons, broke the sacred rules of the Tang Sect by stealing its most secret teachings. Facing the consequences, he chose to plunge to his death from the treacherous Hell's Peak. But instead of meeting his end, he found himself reincarnated in a world known as Douluo Dalu, where every individual possesses a unique spirit. In this new world, those with powerful spirits can harness their spirit power to become formidable Spirit Masters. However, Tang San's awakened spirit is Blue Silver Grass, considered to be one of the weakest. With the memories of his past life and his unwavering determination, Tang San embarks on a challenging journey to rise among the ranks of the Spirit Masters and bring honor to the Tang Sect in this unfamiliar world.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
